content: wintress is a hat that is constructed by first making a corrugated ribbing then working a chart that is repeated 6 times per round the ribbing is worked with size 2 needle then the rest of the hat is worked with size 3 needles only 2 colors are worked at a time yarn needed to make this hat knit picks palette fingering weight 100% wool yarn cream mc 66 yds clover 66 yds silver 20 yds ash 36 yds spearmint 20 yds orange 5 yds one size fits a 22-24 inch head
